title: I am accepting GIRLFRIEND applications
body:
Ye, so every day I get a lot of girls who are like “ayyyy yo wassup, can I get yo numbah” and I know I am very desirable so I figured I would give you all a shot.

Please list your:
- Name
- Height
- Why I should date you

If you’re interesting, I might grant you the HONOR of talking to me.

Also, if you’re Mongolian don’t bother.
